---
title: "Comparison of TTR between languages"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```


```{r}
df <- read.csv("language_comparison_100_datapoints_per_language.txt", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
df
```


```{r}
df_long <- gather(df)
df_long
```

```{r}
aov_res <- aov(value ~ key, data = df1)
summary(aov_res)
```



```{r}
df_long %>%
  filter(key == "tkr.folklore" | key == "lez.folklore" | key == "lak.folklore") -> df1
df1
```

```{r}
aov_res <- aov(value ~ key, data = df_long)
summary(aov_res)
```





```{r}
library("ggpubr")
```

```{r}
df_long  %>%
  ggplot(aes(reorder(key, value, FUN = median), value, color = key))+
  #ggplot(aes(x = reorder(key, value, FUN = median), y = value), fill = reorder(key, value, FUN = median))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA)+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)+
  labs(x = "Language",
       y = "TTR")+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
